Letter from Melissa Ritter, Superintendent:RAMSEY PARENTS AND STUDENTS

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

p.span: The governor has issued a directive closing all public and private schools beginning March 17th through March 30th. We plan to offer a "grab and go" lunch option to all PK-12 students. Students who are not on a bus route can pick up Breakfast and Lunch at the RHS Circle Drive each day between 10:00 am - 11:00 am Students who are currently on a bus route will have lunches delivered during this time. It is imperative that we have an accurate count for lunches!. Please complete by 3:00 pm the day before you want a meal.

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

p.span: Grab and Go Link. Please sign up for a meal!

span.span: Two day lunches to pick up.

Click Here: CoronaVirus
RAMSEY PARENTS: Please take the time to complete our 5 Essentials Parent Survey! As part of the Illinois 5Essentials Survey process, schools will have the opportunity to hear from their parents. 5Essentials is an evidence-based system designed to drive improvement in schools nationwide—it reliably measures changes in a school organization through the 5Essentials Survey and provides individualized, actionable Reports for each school.
